data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Palmyra, United States Minor Outlying Islands.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Palmyra, United States Minor Outlying Islands

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 40 believers in Palmyra to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 40 believers in Palmyra that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Palmyra who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Palmyra prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Palmyra.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 100 citizens of the the state of Palmyra.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.focus_label: Palmyra, United States Minor Outlying Islands

location.name: Palmyra
location.full_name: Palmyra, United States Minor Outlying Islands
